auth.remove-account.link-sent: We have sent an email on address {email}. To remove your account use the link from the email message.
not-found.message: Content you were looking for does not exist.
password.reset.link-sent: We have sent an email on address {email}. To reset your password use the link from the email message.
sign-up.success.message: We have sent an email on address {email}. To finish sign up process use the link from the email message to confirm your registration
